sentences_summary: Courses Learning Tracks Certifications FAQs Dora Login Certifications SnowProÂ® Advanced Data Scientist DSA-C01  DSA-C02 SnowProÂ® Advanced Data Scientist The SnowPro Advanced Data Scientist Certification exam will test advanced knowledge and skills used to apply comprehensive data science principles tools and methodologies using Snowflake. On May 23 2023 Snowflake will be releasing a new version of the SnowPro Advanced Data Scientist Certification Exam version DSA-C02. DSA-C01 will be available until May 22 2023. Register Now Certification About Certification Exam Breakdown Domain Breakdown DSA-C01 transition to DSA-C02 On May 23 2023 Snowflake will be releasing a new version of the SnowPro Advanced Data Scientist Certification Exam version DSA-C02. For more information please visit DSA-C02 Transition FAQs SNOWPROÂ® ADVANCED DATA SCIENTIST OVERVIEW The SnowProÂ® Advanced Data Scientist Certification exam will test advanced knowledge and skills used to apply comprehensive data science principles tools and methodologies using Snowflake. This certification will test the ability to â¢ Outline data science concepts â¢ Implement Snowflake data science best practices â¢ Prepare data and feature engineering in Snowflake â¢ Train and use machine learning models â¢ Use data visualization to present a business case eg model explainability â¢ Implement model lifecycle management SNOWPRO ADVANCED DATA SCIENTIST CANDIDATE 2 years of practical data science experience with Snowflake in an enterprise environment. In addition successful candidates may have â¢ A statistical mathematical or science education or equivalent work experience â¢ Background working with one or more of the following programming languages eg Python R SQL PySpark etc.  â¢ Experience modeling and using machine learning platforms eg SageMaker Azure Machine Learning GCP AI platform AutoML tools etc.  â¢ An understanding of various open source and commercial frameworks and libraries eg scikit-learn TensorFlow etc.  â¢ Experience preparing cleaning and transforming data sets from multiple sources â¢ Experience creating features for machine learning training â¢ Experience validating and interpreting models â¢ Experience putting a model into production and monitoring the model in production Target Audience â¢ Data Scientists â¢ AIML Engineers We recommend individuals have at least 2  years of hands-on Snowflake Practitioner experience in a Data Scientist role prior to attempting this exam. The exam will assess skills through scenario-based questions and real-world examples. As preparation for this exam we recommend a combination of hands-on experience instructor-led training and the utilization of self-study assets. Instructor-Led Course recommended for this exam Data Science Training Free Self Study recommended for this exam DSA-C01 SnowPro Advanced Data Scientist Exam Study Guide DSA-C02 SnowPro Advanced Data Scientist Exam Study Guide SnowPro FAQs Frequently Asked Questions Learn more How much does the exam cost. The SnowPro Core Certification cost is 175 per exam attempt. Every individual registration will require the full 175 USD amount. The SnowPro Advanced Certification series is 375 per exam attempt. Each individual registration will require the full 375 USD amount. Is there a limit on how many times someone can fail an exam. Who do I contact if I run into an issue with registering scheduling or taking an exam online. Can I reschedule my exam if I cannot make my scheduled appointment. Learning Tracks Snowflake Learning Journey You know what youâre looking for and we have curated paths to help you achieve whatever your learning goals. From skill building badges to preparation for the SnowPro core certifications we have you covered. Explore Learning Tracks Snowflake Education Services includes Instructor-Led Training SnowPro Certifications and this online on-demand educational courses website. Our on-demand courses are branded as Snowflake University. Snowflake University aka Uni offers a badge program called Hands-On Essentials as well as other courses. University Courses Learning Tracks Certifications Resources FAQs SnowPro Registrations Info SnowPro FAQs Dora Privacy Notice Site Terms Â© 2023 Snowflake Inc All Rights Reserved.
